授業目的: The purpose of this course is to enable students as future corporate managers to acquire basic knowledge/skills for corporate finance/financial management.
到達目標: Students will be able to apply the basic financial management techniques to day-to-day operations.
関連科目: Students should be familiar with basic financial accounting and introductory management accounting.
授業の概要・背景: For the aim of enabling students to lead corporate financial management, this course provides a rigorous introduction to corporate finance with attention to challenges arising in the private sector.
授業方法: The course employs lecture-discussions: class discussions explore insights from assigned readings.  Several classes are devoted to exercises.  Students are expected to participate actively in class. The 2023 class will be conducted as a "real-time online" lesson.
